item.title: On Systems Programming
item.description: Garbage Collection Garbage Collection is about simulating a computer with infinite memory. Consequently, if you have more RAM than your program will ever need, then a null garbage collector is a valid one. References Everybody thinks about garbage collection the wrong way. Raymond Chen. The Old New Thing. Microsoft. https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20100809-00/?p=13203 . Aug 9, 2010. Re: Does memory leak? Kent Mitchell. Rational Software Corporation.
